attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1000 people leaving to live abroad each day because of this government's gross ineptitude in :
1. wasting millions on the NHS [in admin personnel and IT that doesn't work]
2. education [half school leavers illiterate]
3. armed forces [ill equipped, totally overstretched, shrinking navy
4. immigration [more coming in than going out because of our benefit system]
5. crime ["human rights" favours the criminal], 
6. prisons[no room left so let the paedophiles and burglars walk the streets]
7. "big brother" [health and safety / right-to-sue culture / human rights / CCTV / too scared anymore to be proud of being british

and the rest of you politicians - you are just as bad
